notes: Reference datetime is Tuesday 2026-02-17, so 'tomorrow' is Wednesday 2026-02-18, 'Thursday' is 2026-02-19, 'Wednesday' is 2026-02-18. Medium conversation (17 lines). Relaxed tolerance due to cross-talk and multiple events.
